name: Memories of a Scattered Mind Alpha Game
name_original: Memories of a Scattered Mind Alpha Game
description:
MEMORIES OF A SCATTERED MIND

This is the alpha version of the game where you'll find pieces of William mind.
Please leave any feedback in comments and tell us if you would like to play it full version.

Controls

Use keyboard and mouse to control.

System Requirements

SO: Windows® 10 64-bit
Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2400 / AMD CPU 4 cores
Memory: 4 GB  RAM
Graphics:  NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 670 2GB / AMD Radeon R9 280 or better
Storage: 3gb.

WARNING:
This game may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy. Viewer discretion is advised.

Feel free to contact us if any doubt.
